comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; en-US; rv:1.9.2a1pre) Gecko/20090706 Minefield/3.6a1pre
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; Intel Mac OS X 10.5; en-US; rv:1.9.2a1pre) Gecko/20090706 Minefield/3.6a1pre

The counter links on the "Hourly Browsing Activity" do not work.  Nothing opens, and an error is fired:

Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80070057 (NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE) [mozIStorageStatement.getParameterIndex]"  nsresult: "0x80070057 (NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE)"  location: "JS frame :: chrome://aboutme/content/aboutMe.js :: processQuery :: line 621"  data: no]

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. install about:me extension
2. open error console
3. click on any of the counter links on Hourly Browsing Activity
Actual Results:  
no links open

Expected Results:  
links open
comments.author: chung808@gmail.com
comments.creator: chung808@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:

The counter links on the "Hourly Browsing Activity" do not work.  Nothing opens, and an error is fired:

Error: uncaught exception: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80070057 (NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE) [mozIStorageStatement.getParameterIndex]"  nsresult: "0x80070057 (NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE)"  location: "JS frame :: chrome://aboutme/content/aboutMe.js :: processQuery :: line 621"  data: no]

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. install about:me extension
2. open error console
3. click on any of the counter links on Hourly Browsing Activity
Actual Results:  
no links open

Expected Results:  
links open

comments.text: Actually, this applies to all counter links within the page, not just the top.
comments.author: chung808@gmail.com
comments.creator: chung808@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: Actually, this applies to all counter links within the page, not just the top.

comments.creator: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: It works in 3.5. I think this is a problem with Minefield because I'm using jQuery, which most likely isn't tested in Minefield.
comments.text: It works in 3.5. I think this is a problem with Minefield because I'm using jQuery, which most likely isn't tested in Minefield.
comments.author: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com

comments.creator: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: The problem was with a change in the mozIStorageStatement API, but it's fixed now. about:me will still work with 3.5, but now will also work with minefield.
comments.text: The problem was with a change in the mozIStorageStatement API, but it's fixed now. about:me will still work with 3.5, but now will also work with minefield.
comments.author: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com

comments.raw_text: Any idea what patch may have fixed it?
comments.creator: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.author: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.text: Any idea what patch may have fixed it?
